title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 June 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:29 <Rich\_Morin\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:39 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
00:46 <jvdrean> has quit  
00:47 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
00:56 <jvdrean> has quit  
02:28 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:30 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
03:38 <sdumitriu> has quit  
03:57 <ssavi> has quit  
05:01 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:12 <sdumitriu> has quit  
07:04 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
07:06 <Denis1> has quit  
07:55 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:00 <CIA-35> Caleb James DeLisle master \* rb43cfd5 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/b43cfd52e21ae5ec2ab0f0ac2ce30d0e3b005cc8 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-query/xwiki-platform-query-xwql/src/main/java/org/xwiki/query/xwql/internal/hql/XWQLtoHQLTranslator.java : [misc] Use logical or rather than bitwise or which provides tiny performance improvement. - http://git.io/z-mLyA  
08:01 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
08:11 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:35 <CIA-35> Marius Dumitru Florea stable-4.1.x \* r3009064 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/300906429933840d5179c3776ac5c8a235888c0b / xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml : XWIKI-7945: Diff of wiki content is not showing up - http://git.io/g2xErA  
08:38 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <+tmortagne> cjd: Hi  
08:58 <+tmortagne> want to do the 4.1.2 release or starting to get bored ?  
08:59 <@cjd> heh should we do it now or wait a bit to see if anything comes up?  
08:59 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:59 <@cjd> Also did you use the push\_release.sh script to publicise the release?  
08:59 <@cjd> (4.0.1)  
08:59 <+tmortagne> not sure if sburjan`did a complete pass on it, aat least from what I know the issue I knew in 4.1.1 is fixed  
08:59 <@cjd> because that script is so big and scary that I've shied away from it so far :)  
09:00 <+tmortagne> cjd: I used part of push\_release.sh  
09:00 <+tmortagne> I don't use all the wiki related stuff  
09:00 <+tmortagne> because they used to not work well (REST issues etc)  
09:00 <+tmortagne> but all the rest works pretty well  
09:01 <@cjd> publicising it on wikipedia etc?  
09:01 <+tmortagne> no things related to xwiki.org (create blog, update API page, etc.)  
09:01 <+tmortagne> there is nothing in there for wikipedia  
09:01 <@cjd> ahh ok  
09:01 <@cjd> do you have the version you used?  
09:02 <+tmortagne> it's the standard one but with lines at the ends I comment depending of which actions I want  
09:02 <+tmortagne> on maven.xwiki.org  
09:02 <+tmortagne> see the release process page  
09:02 <+tmortagne> maven.xwiki.org is because of ow2 upload  
09:02 <@cjd> hmm ok  
09:03 <@cjd> I might just do it manually again because last thing I want is a runnaway script trashing a bunch of websites  
09:03 <@cjd> I can make mistakes and trash websites myself thankyouverymuch  
09:03 <+tmortagne> cjd: the part I'm using works well we wee use it since a long time now  
09:04 <+tmortagne> just avoid the xwiki.org parts but the rest is ok  
09:04 <@cjd> hmm ok  
09:04 <+tmortagne> it's nice for ow2 at least  
09:04 <+tmortagne> it choose and scp all the required files  
09:04 <+tmortagne> which is nice  
09:04 <@cjd> yes, ow2 is strait forward  
09:04 <+tmortagne> and create the pages  
09:05 <@cjd> I added an scp script which does that part, it's in the git repo. one thing I found you have to watch out for is that nexus doesn't push the files immedietly so there's a bit of a race condition  
09:06 <@cjd> Anyway, I'll be happy to do this one, IMO we should wait a bit and make sure everyone's all set  
09:06 <+tmortagne> cjd: your script also create the pages on ow2 ?  
09:06 <@cjd> no, just push the filed  
09:06 <@cjd> \*files  
09:07 <+tmortagne> cjd: in any case I agree with you that push-release is too big and would be nicer to cut all that in peaces  
09:07 <vmassol> has quit  
09:09 <@cjd> putting it in seperate scripts has a nice benefit over seperate functions because variables are all global in bash by default  
09:09 <@cjd> even if the scripts all get called from one master script  
09:09 <+tmortagne> yep and it makes easier to use one specific script because what I do right now by commenting lines it's not the safest...  
09:12 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <vmassol> good morning  
09:16 <@cjd> Good morning. tmortagne recommended releasing 4.1.2 today, anything blocking it from your end?  
09:17 <+tmortagne> mflorea: just to be sure, it's ok on your side right ?  
09:17 <vmassol> nope, nothing on my side except maybe verify that sburjan` has tested it  
09:18 <vmassol> if sburjan` hasn't tested it or doesn't have the time today, I'd say go for it  
09:18 <@cjd> Sounds good.  
09:18 <vmassol> sburjan`: good morning, btw I need your reply on the "Move contrib JIRA macro to retired and hijack JIRA Macro page on e.x.o." thread to finish it  
09:19 <+sburjan`> good morning  
09:20 <+sburjan`> No, I have not tested 4.1.2 because I didn't had the time. I need 3 days to properly test, if you are willing to wait.  
09:21 <+sburjan`> vmassol: replied  
09:21 <+sburjan`> I see Ludovic reported this yesterday: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7967  
09:21 <+sburjan`> I don't understand much of it, but I will try to figure out when I arrive at the office  
09:21 <+sburjan`> be back in 30  
09:31 <+mflorea> cjd, tmortagne: nothing to commit on 4.1.x on my side  
09:55 <cjd> has quit  
09:55 <vmassol> actually I need to commit one thing for 4.1.2, doing it now  
09:59 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XRENDERING-214  
10:03 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol master \* r52d05aa https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/52d05aaffb6723d977c6442c202b9be2978d641f / xwiki-rendering-macros/xwiki-rendering-macro-jira/pom.xml : XRENDERING-213: Add JIRA Macro - http://git.io/IFyx8g  
10:03 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <+sburjan> back  
10:08 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <vmassol> guys  
10:16 <vmassol> I'd like to be able to use the new jira macro on 4.1.x for using it on xwiki.org ASAP  
10:16 <vmassol> would you be ok for me to merge it on 4.1.2?  
10:16 <vmassol> it's not bundled by default and not risky  
10:17 <+tmortagne> ok for me\*  
10:17 <vmassol> cjd: ?  
10:17 <vmassol> (I can do it in the coming 30 mn)  
10:17 <+sburjan> so are we releasing today 4.1.2 ?  
10:18 <@cjd> We don't have an explicit deadline so I'd say go for it.  
10:20 <vmassol> ok doing it  
10:29 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol stable-4.1.x \* r2aece32 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/2aece32eb320eecfa1bdfc32dd541fe0e0349dbd / xwiki-rendering-macros/xwiki-rendering-macro-jira/pom.xml : XRENDERING-213: Add JIRA Macro (+5 more commits...) - http://git.io/bptyQg  
10:32 <vmassol> done  
10:33 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r1982106 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/1982106f8749f05bdc5c4baa59581e2c8399e110 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-204: Upgrade to reflections 0.9.8 - http://git.io/XpwGPA  
10:33 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* rbadf65b https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/badf65b090268962fff892904ab1f60948a00454 / xwiki-commons-core/xwiki-commons-extension/xwiki-commons-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/internal/local/DefaultLocalExtensionFile.java : Minor codestyle - http://git.io/m9Qz3Q  
10:45 <+tmortagne> I'm about to remove 4.0 branch from jenkins, ok for everyone ?  
10:47 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok for me  
10:49 <+tmortagne> done  
10:50 <@cjd> 2 issues without documentation, they're bugs and will show in release notes so I'll just "n/a" them: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7946 http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7963  
10:51 <+tmortagne> cjd: n/a if ok for theses yes  
10:54 <@cjd> do we update translations for a point release? I have been but I wasn't sure if it's considered dangerous in some way  
10:55 <vmassol> it could be dangerous, so I'd say +1 but with a quick oversight  
10:55 <@cjd> I do usually run git diff and just make sure there's no technical issues  
10:55 <@cjd> whether or not it's full of swear words in another langauge, I couldn't say :)  
10:55 <vmassol> hehe  
10:56 <vmassol> that's always the issue  
10:56 <vmassol> future idea: have translations packs as extensions  
10:56 <@cjd> +1  
10:56 <@cjd> I'd like to see everything become extensions  
10:57 <vmassol> yup  
10:59 <vmassol> we need to plan upgrade of xwiki.org and myxwiki.org this week  
10:59 <vmassol> cjd and all: re 4.1.2 I think we should release it ASAP  
11:00 <vmassol> right now people are downloading 4.1.1  
11:00 <@cjd> yeap, in progress  
11:00 <vmassol> ok great  
11:00 <vmassol> wasn't sure  
11:01 <@cjd> At some point, I want to do some profiling of the cache, LRU is likely to be flushed when lucene does a scan and there are some pretty clever cache metrics out there.  
11:09 <@cjd> this is odd: https://ezcrypt.it/Zg5n#Sv9SHaSu2DjAgbrlynmvV5yM  
11:10 <@cjd> a bunch of translations for the word "delete" were overwritten  
11:10 <@cjd> since that's all there is, I think I'll hold the translations for now and we can investigate why  
11:18 <vmassol> cjd: yes that's plain wrong  
11:18 <vmassol> glad you did oversight :)  
11:18 <vmassol> these l10n changes need to be reverted  
11:18 <vmassol> we could contact the creator if we have his email  
11:18 <vmassol> it could also be a technical issue  
11:23 <@cjd> I am a big fan of scripting things but I also like to review the patches which my scripts spit out :)  
11:25 <vmassol> good combination :)  
11:42 <vmassol> cjd: jira macro issue?  
11:43 <@cjd> yes, looks like another ${platform.version} vs. ${commons.version}  
11:43 <@cjd> err ${project.version}  
11:43 <vmassol> ok checking that  
11:43 <vmassol> hmm  
11:43 <vmassol> I don't have any dep  
11:44 <vmassol> where do you see the problem?  
11:45 <@cjd> https://ezcrypt.it/bh5n#IDXMdyWsO4OPnG3khq1kqGvF  
11:46 <vmassol> ah I know  
11:46 <vmassol> my bad  
11:46 <vmassol> fixing  
11:46 <vmassol> the pb is the parent version  
11:46 <vmassol> I have 4.2-SNAP instead of 4.1-SNAP  
11:47 <+sburjan> vmassol: I'm proposing we add a database migration section in our release notes, so I can list clearly if I tested migrations on it or not  
11:47 <+sburjan> because for example I did not test migration to 4.1.1 because it was released on a very short notice  
11:47 <+sburjan> does this need a vote or something ?  
11:47 <vmassol> we would need to define more precisely what it means  
11:47 <vmassol> yes best to discuss it on the list  
11:47 <+tmortagne> cjd: re https://ezcrypt.it/Zg5n#Sv9SHaSu2DjAgbrlynmvV5yM yes it's very weird, I'm looking at it  
11:48 <+sburjan> what it means is that we take the latest version from an old cycle, ATM I am using 2.7.2 and test the migration on the supported db's to the releasing version  
11:49 <vmassol> yes but using pristine version may not be enough  
11:49 <vmassol> \*versions  
11:49 <vmassol> it's a start though  
11:50 <@cjd> hmm  
11:50 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol stable-4.1.x \* r4724414 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-rendering/commit/472441414a638fe8894d5ab28410387a6b020738 / xwiki-rendering-macros/xwiki-rendering-macro-jira/pom.xml : XRENDERING-213: Add JIRA Macro - http://git.io/f5eXWA  
11:50 <vmassol> sburjan: it could be a good idea, best is to discuss it on list  
11:50 <+sburjan> vmassol: the thing is that I can't do much more except testing migrations .. related to db support. so we should expose that we don't actually manually nor automatically test the releases on each db, but we only test migration  
11:51 <vmassol> sburjan: migrating myxwiki.org for ex is a better test IMO  
11:51 <vmassol> (not enough either but a real life one)  
11:51 <+sburjan> ok, going to start a thread on this. yes, there is also this aspect. My test can't be scaled to large wikis  
11:51 <vmassol> it can  
11:51 <vmassol> with myxwiki.org  
11:51 <vmassol> which is our test platform  
11:51 <+tmortagne> cjd: actually looks like https://ezcrypt.it/Zg5n#Sv9SHaSu2DjAgbrlynmvV5yM fix something that was wrong  
11:52 <+tmortagne> thoses are not really translations  
11:52 <vmassol> and which we're currently not using at all which is very very bad  
11:52 <+tmortagne> but key configuration  
11:52 <+tmortagne> so translation them was probably wrong  
11:52 <+tmortagne> maybe someone fixed them  
11:52 <+sburjan> vmassol: yes, I agree. too bad we can't use that to test migrations with it. I could propose this also, at each major version to upgrade myxwiki.org  
11:53 <+sburjan> wdyt ?  
11:54 <+tmortagne> jvdrean: WDYT ? I mean which one is right for shortcuts ? Is "Delete" a technical identifier or can it be translated ?  
12:00 <+jvdrean> tmortagne, cjd: indeed "Delete" was is a key identifier here  
12:00 <+tmortagne> cjd: so looks lke the modification you have are actually fixing a bug  
12:00 <vmassol> sburjan: we can use it to test migrations but not all combinations  
12:01 <vmassol> it's not at each major version!  
12:01 <vmassol> it's at each release that we must upgrade mxwiki.org  
12:01 <vmassol> it's meant for that  
12:01 <+sburjan> so if you release 4.1 and 4.01 and 4.1.1 in the same week, which of them will we choose ?  
12:01 <vmassol> the latest  
12:02 <vmassol> myxwiki.org is suppoed to always have the latest  
12:02 <ssavi> has left #xwiki  
12:03 <vmassol> lunch time, I'm hungry… bbl  
12:03 <+sburjan> vmassol: ok, so I am going to prorpose 2 things. 1) when we list db's in the release notes, we should should specify that we are testing only migrations, not a full test (manual or automatic) 2)Upgrade myxwiki.org when a new version is released. Now AFAIK myxwiki.org is usiny MYSQL, so we have at least one database tested with a more advanced/bigger wiki  
12:04 <+sburjan> going to wait for you after you come back to lunch  
12:07 <+tmortagne> cjd: as far as I can see on l10n wiki it has been fixed by sdumitriu  
12:07 <+tmortagne> you should really commit those IMO  
12:07 <@cjd> ok  
12:08 <+tmortagne> because right now delete shortcut probably only work if your UI is in English  
13:45 <+sburjan> vmassol: could you tell me if the proposal is ok so I can send it to the devlist ?  
13:46 <sburjan> has left #xwiki  
13:46 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <vmassol> sburjan: I think some points need to be fine tuned but send your proposal, we can comment on it  
13:48 <vmassol> FTR xwiki commons is only at 62.4% TPC  
13:50 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
13:53 <vmassol> tmortagne: fyi DefaultVersionRange could have some more unit tests  
13:53 <vmassol> 62.4% is only including tests found in xwiki-commons  
13:54 <+tmortagne> vmassol: are you publishing the result ?  
13:54 <vmassol> now going to add rendering, platform and enterprise  
13:54 <vmassol> later on yes  
13:54 <vmassol> when I've included everythin  
13:54 <vmassol> I could publish separate + aggregated too but it's more work  
13:54 <vmassol> I'll see if I do it or not  
13:55 <+sburjan> ok vmassol , thanks. I'll start writing the proposal and the community will help me fine tune it  
14:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: that would be a very sensible thing to do  
14:05 <vmassol> maybe not one full version but all committers working on tests for, say, 1 month would go a long way already  
14:07 <+tmortagne> yes you can translate "version" by "long period of time"  
14:08 <vmassol> now fixing xwiki-rendering for clover execution… sigh....  
14:09 <CIA-35> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r3745adb https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/3745adb3ff40442735086e770f5ffa00b4dd77af / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/js/xwiki/xwikiexplorer/xwikiexplorer.js : XWIKI-7889: wysiwyg: Cannot list attachments for pages with a period "." in their name - TRANSPORT\_ERROR - http://git.io/sgmB1g  
14:09 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol master \* ra052cac https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/a052cac2de12145d526023aed8a398232d8d9105 / (2 files in 2 dirs): [Misc] Make Clover work again on xwiki-commons and upgrade to Clover 3.1.6 - http://git.io/3nnETw  
14:10 <vmassol> mflorea: is this last commit a candidate for 4.1.2?  
14:10 <+mflorea> no  
14:17 <vmassol> mflorea: any more info? :)  
14:18 <vmassol> from the outside it looks like something that could be useful in 4.1.2 since it affects 3.5  
14:18 <vmassol> too dangerous?  
14:19 <+mflorea> yes, I changed xwikiexplorer.js a bit, but more importantly it depends on the new JS api for resolving/serializing entity references  
14:19 <vmassol> ok I see  
14:19 <CIA-35> Vincent Massol master \* r382779a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/382779afc86c5343121efc00ff082865dd633190 / xwiki-commons-tools/xwiki-commons-tool-xar/xwiki-commons-tool-xar-plugin/pom.xml : [Misc] Make Clover work again on xwiki-commons and upgrade to Clover 3.1.6 (Fixed comment) - http://git.io/n5dPJg  
14:43 <+sburjan> vmassol: ail sent  
14:43 <+sburjan> \*mail  
15:07 <CIA-35> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r1abe8b6 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/1abe8b6b088a4e989e4077bcbbcc4c82b647d0e8 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7889: wysiwyg: Cannot list attachments for pages with a period "." in their name - TRANSPORT\_ERROR - http://git.io/tw8n3Q  
15:26 <vmassol> wow 22 minutes to generate the clover report when combining commons and rendernig...  
15:26 <vmassol> FTR total combined TPC is 72%  
15:27 <vmassol> wikimodel is dragging us down at46%  
15:53 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:15 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
16:15 <@sdumitriu> Pong

16:24 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:27 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
16:41 <jvelo> has quit  
16:45 <AndreiHalici> has joined #xwiki

17:08 <polx> has quit  
17:33 <sburjan> has quit  
17:47 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* re5f2c85 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/e5f2c85dcf1ff59aeb87e2f4ec801b6fc72baaf9 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-205: 1.1-milestone-1 version is greater than 1.1.1 - http://git.io/EDnd4g  
17:47 <CIA-35> tmortagne stable-4.0.x \* r0898b28 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/0898b284c38dae1177f603cb9163f6b6135e31bf / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-205: 1.1-milestone-1 version is greater than 1.1.1 - http://git.io/wjOTow  
17:47 <CIA-35> tmortagne stable-4.1.x \* r6fb3fda https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/6fb3fda4e3d40add4218587d4d713bb7d3007b7a / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-205: 1.1-milestone-1 version is greater than 1.1.1 - http://git.io/ClUNvA
